Text: Psychotria is a genus of flowering plants in the Rubiaceae family.
Triplets:<Psychotria
1:
--------------------
Text: Psychotria:  It contains around 1,850 species and is therefore one of the largest genera of flowering plants.
Triplets:<Psychotria
2:
--------------------
Text: Psychotria:  The genus has a pantropical distribution and members of the genus are small understorey trees in tropical forests.
